metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10935 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the 389 Directory Server that allows users to cause acrash in the LDAP server using ldapsearch with server side sort.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10935` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.0.15-1
389-ds-base - 1.4.0.15-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.0.15-1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.0.15-1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.0.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.15-1').
